casebody.data:
First Department,

May, 2007

(May 1, 2007) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v Robin Valentin, Appellant. [835 NYS2d 522]

Judgment, Supreme Court, Bronx County (Steven L. Barrett, J.), rendered on or about June 8, 2005, unanimously affirmed. No opinion. Order filed. Concur—Sullivan, J.E, Williams, Sweeny, Catterson and Malone, JJ.
